message: She is a HERO!!!

This is where Liberalism, and the subsequent desire for a nanny state, fails. It is not the government's job to babysit us. We have our own liberty in this nation, at least for now, and we are to exercise it. It is indeed unfortunate that mental illness played a factor here, but unless someone reaches out for help, or a family member were to commit her for evaluation, there is not really much the city could (or should) do.

Attorney: The Video Game. Now all the excitement of doing legal research, reconciling conflicting court precedent, drafting legal briefs, and making arguments to a disinterested panel of judges can be yours at home. Why spend thousands of dollars on law school and go into years of crushing debt when you can experience all the excitement of rainmaking, sucking up to senior partners, and responding to bar complaints from your vitrual clients for the low, low price of $59.99?

what is happening at the refuge...besides some people camping in the cold? People take guns on public land all the time when they're camping... Are you saying the bad words have caused you injury?
